snippet: HOWAT--Anne Hadley. 27 September 1937 - 5 January 2016. Executive volunteer in family planning through EngenderHealth. She was married to her best friend Jock, who died in June, for 57 years. She was a loving mother to her daughters, Karen and Laura, both surviving, and a kind and engaging friend to many. In lieu of flowers, please send donations to EngenderHealth, New York City. Memorial plans are to be determined. 1/3
